texts.text0: I'm a software/web-developer interested in technology and programming.
texts.text1: I've studied Management Information Systems and English Language Teaching (Double Majors) at Istanbul Bilgi University and attended the Re:Coded Web Development Bootcamp.
texts.text2: I have experience in programming languages such as: Python, Java, React, Javascript, HTML, CSS, SQL and I'm interested in both backend and frontend development.
texts.text3: I love learning new things and am always looking for something new.

texts.text0: An award-winning cloud-based inventory management system used by Tina Zita.
texts.text1: A food coupon donation website that connects the donors with the restaurants for the people in need.
texts.text2: A workout planner app which you can enter your weekly workouts and keep track of them.
texts.text3: An IMDB-like movie/tv-show website that uses Movie-DB API.
texts.text4: A website which you can play madlibs word game.
